Learn with locals while you travel

Learn new skills, meet people and have fun

Imagine going to Bali and instead of just laying by the pool, you might be able to learn a new skill or upskill an existing one?

Learn with Locals allows you to meet likeminded people and learn something new and why not learn it from locals who know it best? Why not learn how to code that website you've always wanted or brush up on those photography skills? You might also get started with yoga like you've always wanted to master?

Featured Skills & Experiences

Food Photography & Styling

Learn how to take beautiful food pictues and how you can style your food shots. You will learn about lighthing and how to create depth using your smartphone.

London, U.K.

1 day, 8 hours - Zandra - 100 GBP

Hand Painted Lettering

Learn hand painted letter styles and techniques giving you the skills to create your own signs and hand lettering designs.

Dublin, Ireland

2 full days, 7 hours each day - Vanessa Powers - €275 EUR per course

Kimbap making

Learn how to make beautiful kimbap, everything from picking the right kind of rice, to washing the rice and picking the ingredients.

Seoul, South Korea

1 day - Ulla - $60 USD

Life Coaching

Learn about yourself and your life path

Somewhere in the world

1 day - Kevin - $60 USD

Photography and lightroom editing

Learn how to take beautiful photos and edit them with Adobe lightroom.

Bali, Indonesia

2 days - Emilio - $200 USD

Power Vinyasa Yoga

Learn the basics of Power Vinyasa yoga and how to keep practicing on your own.

Bali, Indonesia

1 day - Amaranta - $100 USD

Hand Painted Lettering

Learn hand painted letter styles and techniques giving you the skills to create your own signs and hand lettering designs.

Dublin, Ireland

2 full days, 7 hours each day - Vanessa Powers - €275 EUR per course

Web Development

Learn how to build badass websites. Be your own boss and get an understanding of how coding works.

Bali, Indonesia

3 days - Tina - $300 USD

Cindy

Content Strategist
"
I always wanted to learn coding, so I signed up for a 3 day experience with Tina. I can honestly say it's been hard as hell, but I've learned how to code my own website and my problem solving skills have improved too. Can only recommend this skill to anyone wanting to better themselves and learn something new.
"
